# Goblins
Goblins are a race of humanoid beings. They tend to be small, very loud and fragile.
## Benefits
- Due to their unusual dietary choices goblins take [color=lime]25% less Toxin damage[/color], - When unarmed, their claws deal [color=red]Slash[/color] damage instead of Blunt. - Smaller than humans. - Can fit in duffelbags.
## Special
- Can rummage in disposal chutes to dig up trash. - Can dive into toilets and mailing units because of their small size. - Unique chants. - Inherently speak in Goblin Cant.
## Drawbacks
- Because of their small size they take [color=#ffa500]20% more Brute (Blunt/Slash/Piercing) damage[/color]. - Always triggers mousetraps, even when wearing shoes. - They don't like to be sprayed with water or space cleaner.
